intro.title: We Open the Gates of Knowledge and Global Opportunities for You
intro.description: Poupak Sepehr International Institute for the Recruitment and Admission of International Students, officially licensed by the Ministry of Science, Research, and Technology of the Islamic Republic of Iran, specializes in securing admissions for international students at prestigious Iranian universities. The institute aims to facilitate the admission process for students from various countries and offers its services for undergraduate, master's, and doctoral programs in diverse fields. With its experience and expertise, Poupak Sepehr paves the way for international students to pursue higher education in Iran.

faq.question: Does Poupak Sepehr Institute have an official license?
faq.answer: Yes, Poupak Sepehr Institute is officially licensed by the Ministry of Science, Research, and Technology.

faq.question: What documents are required for admission to Iranian universities?
faq.answer: Required documents include official translations of academic certificates, enrollment certificates, passport copies, personal photos, and in some cases, a CV or motivation letter. Our institute will assist you throughout the preparation and submission process.

faq.question: What is the difference between VIP, Silver, and Bronze services?
faq.answer: VIP services provide full support from consultation to obtaining a visa and final university registration. Silver and Bronze services cover fewer steps and offer limited support compared to the VIP package.

faq.question: Does the institute provide translation and certification services?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer official document translation services and assist in obtaining certifications from the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, the Ministry of Justice, and the Consulate.

faq.question: How can I consult with the institute’s experts?
faq.answer: You can contact us via the 'Contact Us' section on the website or visit our office for in-person consultations at various academic levels.

faq.question: Is it possible to obtain a student visa through the institute?
faq.answer: Yes, Poupak Sepehr Institute professionally and comprehensively handles all procedures for obtaining final admission and a student visa.
